expo.name: TradeByBarter
expo.description: Nigerian barter marketplace - Trade anything, anywhere

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TradeByBarter needs camera access to take photos of items you want to trade
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TradeByBarter needs photo library access to select images for your listings
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TradeByBarter uses your location to show nearby listings and improve your trading experience
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: TradeByBarter uses Face ID for secure authentication
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: TradeByBarter needs microphone access for voice messages in chat
